## mediationverse

A unified R ecosystem for mediation analysis, providing tools for model fitting, effect sizes, confidence intervals, sensitivity analysis, and simulation.

[![GitHub](https://img.shields.io/badge/GitHub-mediationverse-blue?logo=github)](https://github.com/Data-Wise/mediationverse)
[![Docs](https://img.shields.io/badge/Docs-Website-green)](https://data-wise.github.io/mediationverse)

### Installation

```r
# Install the entire ecosystem
pak::pak("data-wise/mediationverse")

# Load all packages
library(mediationverse)
```

### Package Ecosystem

| Package | Description | Status |
|---------|-------------|--------|
| [**mediationverse**](https://github.com/Data-Wise/mediationverse) | Meta-package (loads all) | Development |
| [**medfit**](https://github.com/Data-Wise/medfit) | Model fitting & extraction | Development |
| [**probmed**](https://github.com/Data-Wise/probmed) | P_med effect sizes | Stable |
| [**RMediation**](https://cran.r-project.org/package=RMediation) | Confidence intervals | [![CRAN](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/RMediation)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=RMediation) |
| [**medrobust**](https://github.com/Data-Wise/medrobust) | Sensitivity analysis | Development |
| [**medsim**](https://github.com/Data-Wise/medsim) | Simulation infrastructure | Development |

### Quick Example

```r
library(mediationverse)

# Fit mediation models
fit_m <- lm(Mediator ~ Treatment + Covariates, data = mydata)
fit_y <- lm(Outcome ~ Treatment + Mediator + Covariates, data = mydata)

# Extract mediation data
med_data <- extract_mediation(fit_m, fit_y, 
                               treatment = "Treatment", 
                               mediator = "Mediator")

# Compute effects
effects <- compute_effects(med_data)
ci <- ci_mediation(med_data, type = "distribution-of-product")
sensitivity <- sensitivity_analysis(med_data)
```

## RMediation (CRAN)

Standalone package for computing confidence intervals for mediated effects using the distribution-of-product method.

[![CRAN](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/RMediation)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=RMediation)
[![Downloads](https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/grand-total/RMediation)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=RMediation)

```r
install.packages("RMediation")
library(RMediation)

# Compute CI for indirect effect
medci(mu.x = 0.5, mu.y = 0.3, 
      se.x = 0.1, se.y = 0.1, 
      type = "dop")
```
